summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Wine Pairing App MVP. Backend API testing achieved 92.9% success rate (13/14 tests passed). Frontend testing was fully successful with all core features working: landing page, navigation, wine pairing, wine cellar management, and sommelier chat. Integration between frontend and backend is working properly.

minor_bugs.issue: Label scanner returns validation error when processing images
minor_bugs.error_details: Pydantic validation errors for LabelScanResponse - name and type fields returning None
minor_bugs.impact: Label scanning feature not working, but other features unaffected

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and navigation
Navigation dock works between all pages (Home, Pairing, Keller, Sommelier)
Wine Pairing page - dish input and AI recommendations work
Wine Cellar page - add wine functionality works
Wine Cellar page - wine grid display works
Sommelier Chat page - message sending and AI responses work
All backend CRUD operations for wines work
AI wine pairing (basic and with cellar) works
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix label scanner endpoint validation error in /api/scan-label - the LabelScanResponse model is receiving None values for required fields 'name' and 'type' when processing images
success_percentage: Backend: 92.9% (13/14 tests), Frontend: 100% (all core features working)
